name: @epicgames-ps/cirrus-matchmaker
description: Cirrus servers connect to the Matchmaker which redirects a browser to the next available Cirrus server

scripts.start:default:
if [ `id -u` -eq 0 ]
then
 export process="./platform_scripts/bash/node/bin/node matchmaker.js"
else
 export process="sudo ./platform_scripts/bash/node/bin/node matchmaker.js"
fi
$process
